page.title: 13Blakesley Agricultural Show.
page.content: Blakesley and District Agricultural Society held its 102nd show at Seawell Grounds by kind permission of Mr & Mrs P.M.Donger. The show is organised voluntarily by local farmers and others in the area. This Sat. show comprises of classes for dairy,beef,horse,cereal and fodder crops. There were 75 dairy, 45 beef,250 sheep and 60 entries of cereal and fodder crops.The horses include working hunters,show jumping, gymkhana,mares and foals,leading ponies and driving.400 horses attended.The Mid Shires Goat Soc.participate by organizing their own section.An added attraction are the trade stands plus stalls from surrounding village organisations.There were about 2000 people including exhibitors and visitors. Exhibitors came from within a radius of 120 miles.
